metadata.title: CVE-2024-56690 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  crypto: pcrypt - Call crypto layer directly when padata_do_parallel() return -EBUSY  Since commit 8f4f68e788c3 ("crypto: pcrypt - Fix hungtask for PADATA_RESET"), the pcrypt encryption and decryption operations return -EAGAIN when the CPU goes online or offline. In alg_test(), a WARN is generated when pcrypt_aead_decrypt() or pcrypt_aead_encrypt() returns -EAGAIN, the unnecessary panic will occur when panic_on_warn set 1. Fix this issue by calling crypto layer directly without parallelization in that case.
